title: Wesseling on British and Indian Textiles MCQ 2

content.question: Wesselingâ€™s argument in the second paragraph best illustrates which of the following important distinctions within the practice of imperialism in the nineteenth century?

choices.label: The difference between European and non-European imperialism
The difference between land-based imperial expansion and overseas or maritime imperial expansion
The difference between the economic costs of imperialism and its economic benefits
The difference between the economic effects of direct and indirect imperialism

content.answer: The difference between the economic effects of direct and indirect imperialism

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
